track_and_manage:
Track & manage 
jobs on the go!
easily_tracking_your_crew: Easily track your crew at all your timesheets anytime, anywhere.
effortlessly_create_and_manage: Effortlessly create and manage timesheets instantly, all in one place
automatically_track_and_calculate: Automatically track and calculate hours so you don’t have to
in_depth_timesheets: In-depth timesheets effectively track project progress, productivity and profitablity.
invalid_password_format: Password should have minimum 8 chars with uppercase,lowercase,number & special chars
to_join_a_project: To join a project, a Crew Manager will send you an invite.
in_the_meantime_update_your_project: In the meantime, update your profile
crew_managers_create_projects: Crew Managers create projects, invite crew members, and manage timesheets.
